q: backup quarterback to one of the league's most electrifying players once again. On Monday, the mayor of Dallas made it clear that he wasn't involved in the decision to honour Michael Vick . The action taken was not sanctioned by my office and was not an official ceremonial honour on behalf of the city of Dallas, Mayor Tom Leppert said in a statement. Michael Gove said he wanted to encourage new organisations to run pupil referral units, including one that recruited army veterans. Most local authority-run pupil referral units are not up to snuff... and we know that there are organisations which have done a fantastic job in meeting some of the needs that these young people have. There's an organisation called Skillforce that takes ex-army veterans and helps them deal with children that are at risk of disengagement, and I know they're interested too, in playing a part in helping. the schools white paper published last November, also includes measures to narrow the focus of Ofsted inspections from 27 categories to just four. ( D-CA), Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz ( D-FL) and Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-NY), were in the room when Nancy Pelosi Gabrielle Giffords raised her eyelids. called it a "girl power" moment. After she heard our voices and the encouragement of[ her husband] Mark[ Kelly] and her parents, she struggled briefly and opened her eyes for the very first time. It was a miracle to witness, says Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand . The strength of political sisters, the love of friends and family, top-notch medical care and Nancy Pelosi Gabrielle Giffords ' obviously strong will to survive made this moment possible.

same. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. "We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time," Eric Schmidt said in a statement. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
